description: This file defines a Controller class for a TodoMVC application, managing interactions between the model and view components, handling user events, and updating the UI accordingly.

classes.name: Controller
classes.description: Manages the application logic, user interactions, and updates between the model and view components.

methods.name: setView
methods.description: Loads and initializes the view based on the URL hash.

methods.name: showActive
methods.description: Displays only active (not completed) todo items.

methods.name: addItem
methods.description: Adds a new todo item with the given title.

methods.name: editItem
methods.description: Enables editing mode for a specific item.

methods.name: editItemSave
methods.description: Saves changes to an item or removes it if the title is empty.

methods.name: editItemCancel
methods.description: Cancels editing mode for a specific item.

methods.name: toggleComplete
methods.description: Toggles completion status of an item.

methods.name: _updateCount
methods.description: Updates UI elements based on the count of active and completed todos.

methods.name: _filter
methods.description: Re-filters todo items based on the current route.
